synopsis.p: Project terms from a lexicon in tree tagger format.

description.p: reads termsFile and assumes a 3-column tree-tagger format. Entries shall be separated by a period (./SENT/.).

param-doc.name: lemmaKeys
param-doc.p: Use lemmas as keys instead of the surface form.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the POS tag of matches.

param-doc.name: termFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the term surface form.

param-doc.name: lemmaFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the term lemma.
